document_data.name: Aerhiot's Field
document_data.mainbody: '''Aerhiot's Field''' was a farm somewhere in [[Faerûn]] during the mid–8{{th}} century [[DR]].

Description.Flora and Fauna: [[Squirrel]]s and [[bird]]s darted along the path every time someone used it.

document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|761}}, while traversing the path between Aerhiot's Field and Salopar's Field, the farmer [[Nuglar]] fell prey to [[Saeraede Lyonora|the Slayer]], a mysterious, ethereal apparition, which slew him and his three [[oxen]], leaving nothing but dust behind.
